ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD security camera, Color DSP
700 TV Lines horizontal resolution, NTSC System. OSD On Screen Display menu for quick adjustment
Weatherproof outdoor housing, IP66, cable through bracket
Built-in 4-9mm zoom focus lens and 42 infrared LEDs for night vision
Package included: 1 x camera, 1 x 12V DC power supply, 1 x Preamp Microphone and 1 of BNC RCA Audio Video Power Cable
